ModMetaData.name: NutritiousKibble
ModMetaData.author: TargetDrone
ModMetaData.description:
v1.6 NutritiousKibble Increases the nutritial value of Kibble, keeping those critters from munching through all your stock instantly
changelog: v1.0 first version v1.1 changed to work with version 0.19.2009 v1.2 changed targetversion to 1.0.0 v1.2.1 ammended tags to use supportedVersions instead of old targetVersion v1.3 fixed compatibility with version 1.1 v1.4 added 1.2 compatibility v1.5 added 1.3 compatibility v1.6 added 1.4 compatibility
